About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Learn more about my journey and experience
About.headline: Full-stack Developer & Designer focused on results
paragraphs: With over 10 years of experience in developing comprehensive web solutions, I combine advanced technical skills with a strong design vision to create high-performance projects.
I'm passionate about Open-source technologies, innovative Web Design, and Bitcoin, and I'm always seeking new challenges and opportunities globally.
My mission is to help businesses and entrepreneurs achieve their goals through customized digital solutions that bring measurable results.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: What people say about my work

list.text: There are three reasons why I’m writing this testimonial for Anderson: Quality, Speed, and Support. The project exceeded expectations in complexity and was even delivered ahead of schedule. All of this, combined with great support, makes him a reliable partner for upcoming projects we are about to launch.
list.name: Carlos Duarte

list.text: Great professional partner, works really well!
list.name: Jefferson Capanema

questions.question: What is the average timeframe to develop a website?
questions.answer: The timeframe depends on the complexity of the project. A simple institutional website may take 2 to 4 weeks, while more complex projects such as e-commerce sites or custom platforms can take 1 to 3 months.

questions.question: How does the development process work?
questions.answer: The process includes: 1) Requirements gathering and briefing, 2) Planning and architecture, 3) Interface design, 4) Development, 5) Testing and adjustments, 6) Launch, and 7) Support. I maintain continuous communication throughout each phase to ensure expectations are met.

questions.question: Do you offer maintenance services after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer monthly maintenance plans that include security updates, bug fixes, minor improvements, and performance monitoring.
